meanings.definition: Fine hairs growing beneath the outer coat of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The cat's underhairs kept it warm during the cold winter.
meanings.sent2: I brushed my dog and noticed the soft underhairs beneath its fur.
meanings.sent3: The underhairs of the rabbit made it look like a fluffy ball bouncing around.
meanings.sent4: The underhairs of the tree branches swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The underhairs of the teddy bear were so delicate, like tiny whispers of silk.

meanings.definition: A layer of hair underneath the visible hair on a person's head.
meanings.sent1: Her underhairs peeked out from under her ponytail.
meanings.sent2: He styled his underhairs differently to add volume to his hair.
meanings.sent3: The underhairs on his head seemed to have a mind of their own, sticking out in all directions.
meanings.sent4: Her underhairs were like a hidden treasure, adding a touch of mystery to her appearance.
meanings.sent5: The underhairs on his head were like a secret garden, unseen but adding beauty to the whole.
